Comment: I gave up the minute I see most articles frame whats happening as "entertainment", like "oh that silly trump just did this!" and the remaining articles speak as if this is the new normal and how to adjust. Since news moves so fast, our attention spans and memories are shot, and everyone uses humor to not take anything serious anymore, I expect us to continue until its too late to stop it. Not trying to be a doomer but what I'm seeing in regards to reactions to this, that reach the masses, even outside of compromised mainstream media just feels like another atrocity we remember in a week but then adjust to and wait for the next. It feels like waiting for the next active school shooter headline and seeing what the deathcount is that time.
Author: Clownsinmypantz
